type.name: org.gradle.plugins.signing.SignatureSpec
type.description: Specifies how objects will be signed.

method.name: getSignatory
method.description:
The signatory that will be performing the signing.

returns:the signatory, or null if none specified.

method.name: getSignatureType
method.description:
The signature representation that will be created.

returns:the signature type, or null if none specified.

method.name: isRequired
method.description:
Whether or not it is required that this signature be generated. A signature may not be able to be generated if a signatory and/or a signature type have not been specified. If it is required and cannot be generated, an exception will be thrown. Otherwise, it will not be generated.

returns:Whether or not it is required that this signature be generated.

method.name: setRequired
setSignatory
method.description:
Sets the signatory that will be signing the input.
param:signatory The signatory

method.name: setSignatureType
method.description:
Sets the signature representation that the signatures will be produced as.
param:type the signature type to use

property.name: required
property.description:
Whether or not it is required that this signature be generated. A signature may not be able to be generated if a signatory and/or a signature type have not been specified. If it is required and cannot be generated, an exception will be thrown. Otherwise, it will not be generated.

returns:Whether or not it is required that this signature be generated.

property.name: signatory
property.description:
The signatory that will be performing the signing.

returns:the signatory, or null if none specified.

property.name: signatureType
property.description:
The signature representation that will be created.

returns:the signature type, or null if none specified.
